mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_DATE , MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_GRANT, MEM_BLACK) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(MEM_NO),0)+1 FROM MEMBER) , #{memId}, CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{memPwd},#{memId}), #{memName}, #{memBirth} , sysdate, #{memPhone}, #{memEmail}, 'U', 0)
